Date: Monday, 7/28/1977
Subject: Progress of Craig Minetto
Dear Sir,
Craig Minetto has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an ERA of 1.63 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
